channel.title: 508 server compiler error
channel.description:
Hey everyone :)
I'm trying to set up a 508 server and my compiler always gives me this error when I run it:
Unrecognized option: -d Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine. Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit. Press any key to continue...
I have no Idea what the problem could be, I have no experience with Java and I hoped I could magically set up a server xD This is the script on my compiler.bat:
@echo off cd .. "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre1.8.0_65\bin\java.exe" -cp . -d ./bin/ ./DavidScape/*.java pause
I'm not sure what I should do, I've tried multiple different things like trying different codes from different compilers but nothing has worked.. I'm currently trying to run a DavidScape server.
If you could help, it'll be much appreciated :) Thanks in advance.

item.title: 508 server compiler error
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Nuggets Sir Nuggets
item.description:
@Sir_Nuggets wrote:

Hey everyone

I’m trying to set up a 508 server and my compiler always gives me this error when I run it:

Unrecognized option: -d
Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine.
Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue…

I have no Idea what the problem could be, I have no experience with Java and I hoped I could magically set up a server xD
This is the script on my compiler.bat:

@echo off
cd …
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre1.8.0_65\bin\java.exe” -cp . -d ./bin/ ./DavidScape/*.java
pause

I’m not sure what I should do, I’ve tried multiple different things like trying different codes from different compilers but nothing has worked…
I’m currently trying to run a DavidScape server.

If you could help, it’ll be much appreciated
Thanks in advance.
